CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. J (short for "J sc") - This is a material or device that is being measured for its quantum efficiency.
2. EQE (short for "External Quantum Efficiency") - This is a measure of the efficiency of a material or device to convert incoming light into electrical charge.
3. monochromatic light - This is a type of light that has a single frequency or wavelength.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. J
2. EQE
3. monochromatic light
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. J

So, the updated list of "Material Name" entities is:

1. J

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| J |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. J sc (short for "J-sc") - a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell or other photovoltaic device in converting light into electrical energy.
2. EQEs (short for "External Quantum Efficiency") - a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell or other photovoltaic device in converting incoming light into electrical energy, expressed as a percentage.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. J sc - a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell or other photovoltaic device in converting light into electrical energy.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| J sc |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Paragraph: It is also worth pointing out that the accuracy of the J sc results was further confirmed by external quantum efficiency ( EQEs ) measurement under illumination of monochromatic light.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities are:

2. External quantum efficiency (EQE)

Both of these entities are properties or values that can be measured or quantified in the context of the paragraph, which is related to the performance of a device or system.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Accuracy
2. External quantum efficiency (EQE)
